translation.en: She didn't know, but should have.
She helped him with the project.
translation.tam: Darmok. Darmok at Tanagra. Darmok and Jilad at Tanagra.

translation.en: Her council and suggestions reduced his anxiety.
He asked them to explain it.
The child figured it out.
They were in physical discomfort.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: They suddenly realized what had elluded them.
They continued their task, undeterred from their past failures.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: The pipe burst, causing a flood.
The manufacturing line was interrupted.
They decided to abruptly stop.
His skills were inadequite, causing the task to be incomplete.
She knew nothing she could do would make it better.
They didn't seem to be able to fathom it.
The ambasador worked hard to broker a deal between everyone involved.
They made the book available for anyone who wanted it.
The opposing army was their foe.
The temptation caused him to move closer.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: The situation is clear and undeniable.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: She refused to help them with their task.
With their old plans in ruin, it was time to try their next idea.
She enticed them out of hiding.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: Everything known was indisputable.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: She said no to his offer of food.
The child hid something so their friend wouldn't find it.
She tried to make him feel better, but it was useless.
The council asked for her report.
No matter how hard they tried, he just couldn't seem to get the picture.
He told his friend that he didn't want the book right now.
His arm had been broken.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: They struck their adversary.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: He hadn't tried to learn the knowledge he needed.
The two groups worked for some time to find a mutually acceptable deal that both sides would benefit from.
They rushed him.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: He cheered up after their talk.
Knowing they would both be needed, they went together.
translation.tam: Darmok. Darmok at Tanagra. Darmok and Jilad at Tanagra.

translation.en: The beast was their enemy.
He asked if she wanted some of her sandwich.
She would keep going until it worked, no matter what.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: He decided to move on to the next island.
